naslov: Villa Giulia Dobropoljana 500.00 m2 otok Pašman (prodaja)
Mogućnost zamjene: Nije moguća zamjena za drugu nekretninu
opis: Prodaje se luksuzno izgrađena villa veličine cca 500 m2 smještena na predivnom terenu od 1250 m2 uz glavnu prometnicu Tkon - Ugljan Nalazi se 200m od mora,sa skoro nijednim susjedom u blizini,a 10tak metri od kuće se upravo radi nova prometnica koja će vas voditi direkt do plaže! Panoramski pogled seže od Zadra do Sv.Petra,imajući ih na dlanu ka kap mora. Odma pri dolasku sa glavne prometnice imate uz cestu parking za 4 auta te još minimalno 4 mjesta i garažu od 50m2 ispod prometnice. Zadnji kat ( Penthouse ) je liveliran sa glavnom prometnicom te sadrži jednu spavaću sobu,wc,dnevnu kuhinju,jedan mali i jedan veliki balkon te galeriju iznad(ostakljena spavaća soba-25m2). Na 1.kat se morete spustiti i kroz kuću i vani po stepenicama,tako da ste u mogućnosti iznajmljivati donji dio kuće i uprihoditi dodatnih 55 000 eura od rentanja a pritom ostajući u svom penthouse-u. Ocijene od 9.5 na Bookingu i Tripadvisoru dovoljno govore o kvaliteti koju su vlasnici pružali gostima. Predsoblje,2 spavaće sobe,wc,dnevni i kuhinja,ostava,dva mala balkona i dva velika balkona se nalaze na 1.katu dok se u prizemlju nalaze još predsoblje,3 spavaće sobe,2 wc-a,dnevni i kuhinja. Ispod prizemlja se još nalazi i konoba veličine 18m2! Ispred je ogromna terasa sa bazenom,roštiljem,ležaljkama,predivnim velikim uređenim vrtom punim mirisnih bilja,nadstrešnica sa stolovima i stolicama za uživati u vanjskoj kužini i predivne,plodne masline... Svaka prostorija u villi je ogromna,kategorizacija za 4 * i 5 *,nije se štedilo niti na kvadraturi niti na materijalu,ulagalo se svake godine što je normalno sa obzirom da je bila obiteljska kuća koja se stalno koristila,no kako su se djeca odselila vlasnici nemaju više potribe za toliko velikom kućom. U mjestu Dobropoljana imate raznovrsne dućane,kafiće i tradicionalni dalmatinski restoran,uljara,raznovrsna igrališta za malene i velike uzraste,veliki broj uređenih plaža,porat za brodove i još mnogo toga... Za ozbiljnog i brzog kupca moguća korekcija cijene! ENGLISH For sale a luxuriously built villa of approx. 500 m2 located on a beautiful plot of 1250 m2 next to the main road Tkon - Ugljan. It is located 200m from the sea, with almost no neighbors nearby, and a new road is being built about 10 meters from the house that will take you directly to the beach! The panoramic view stretches from Zadar to St.Peter, holding them in the palm of your hand to the drop of the sea. As soon as you arrive from the main road, you have parking for 4 cars along the road and a minimum of 4 more spaces and a 50m2 garage under the road. The last floor (Penthouse) is leveled with the main road and contains one bedroom, toilet, living room kitchen, one small and one large balcony and a gallery above (glazed bedroom-25m2). You can go down to the 1st floor both through the house and outside by stairs, so you are able to rent the lower part of the house and earn an additional 55,000 euros from the rental while staying in your penthouse. Ratings of 9.5 on Booking and Tripadvisor speaks for it self about the quality that the owners provided to their guests. Entrance hall, 2 bedrooms, toilet, living room and kitchen, pantry, two small balconies and two large balconies are located on the 1st floor, while on the ground floor there is another entrance hall, 3 bedrooms, 2 toilets, living room and kitchen. Under the ground floor there is also an 18m2 tavern! In front is a huge terrace with a swimming pool, barbecue, deckchairs, a beautiful large landscaped garden full of fragrant herbs, a canopy with tables and chairs for enjoying the outdoor kitchen and beautiful, fruitful olive trees... Every room in the villa is huge, categorized as 4 * and 5 *, no savings were made on space or materials,new investments were made every year, which is normal considering that it was a family house that was constantly used, but when the children moved away the owners no longer had a need for such a large house. In the town of Dobropoljana you have a variety of shops, cafes and a traditional Dalmatian restaurant, an oil mill, various playgrounds for children and adults, a large number of new-built beaches, a marina for boats and much more... Price correction is possible for a serious and quick buyer! Kornati - 5km Pašman - 6km Tkon - 12km Zadar - 15km Ugljan - 26km
